    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WarGame()
      The contstructor creates a a Deck of Cards and deals them to two CardPiles player1 and player2.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getP1Card()
      The getP1Card method gets the top Card and returns the jpg string
      String getP2Card()
      The getP2Card method gets the top Card and returns the jpg string
      void play()
      The play method plays a Card from each pile and determines which player wins, and adds the Cards to that players pile
      int war()
      The war method initiates a war in which each players CardPile plays two cards and the second Cards are compared
      int winner()
      The winner method Determines if either CardPile is empty
